resources.string: Read phone state permission is needed to find out the information about the SIM cards inserted in the device.
Camera permission is needed to scan the recharge cards.
Call phone permission is needed to send the ussd request in background.
Read contacts permission is needed to find a phone number from your contact list.
Send sms permission is needed to send sms to activate/deactivate services.
